languages.text: {n}Янрис издает довольное бульканье, похожее на смех.{/n} "Какое название, а? На деле — пиратская шайка, которая вечно грызется меж собой за добычу и территорию. Впрочем, среди них есть хозяева небольших флотилий, которым нужны поставки... или которые готовы без вопросов забрать с рук неудобный груз. Конечно, при сделке с ними всегда рискуешь, что эти мерзавцы передумают и попытаются тебя тут же взять на абордаж, но до последнего времени они все же опасались наших макропушек. Говорят, от лица братства говорит Ризза Калвария. "Адептус Амасекус" — ее любимое место на Футфоле".

traits.locale_text: "Пиратам с их репутацией нелегко найти надежного поставщика когитаторов и других сложных устройств — а мы даем им такую возможность. Предметами, которых коснулась порча Архиврага, они тоже не гнушаются — предпочитаю не знать, что они творят с ними потом. Мы ведем дела с ними через Риззу Калварию. "Адептус Амасекус" — ее любимое место на Футфоле".

languages.text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."
languages.original_text: {n}Янрис издает довольное бульканье, похожее на смех.{/n} "Какое название, а? На деле — пиратская шайка, которая вечно грызется меж собой за добычу и территорию. Впрочем, среди них есть хозяева небольших флотилий, которым нужны поставки... или которые готовы без вопросов забрать с рук неудобный груз. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... Or can take uncomfortable cargo off your hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk these scoundrels change their mind and attempt to board you instead, but so far our macro-cannons managed to keep them in line. They say Rizza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. "Adeptus Amasecus" on Footfall is rumored to be her favorite haunt.

languages.text: {n}詹里斯发出了类似于笑声的咕噜声。{/n}“真是个花里胡哨的名字，您说是吧？老实说，他们是一群海盗，总是在为如何划分领地，如何分赃吵个不停。不过，他们的舰队需要从我们这里购买补给……或者他们也可能不闻不问，直接从我们手里把东西抢走。当然了，和这群恶棍交易总是有风险的。他们可能会突然改变主意，打算抢走我们的船。不过，到目前为止，他们在我们的舰炮面前还是挺老实的。听说虚空协联的代表是莱萨·卡瓦利亚，她最喜欢的去的地方，是落脚港的艾玛赛克烈酒修会。”
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

traits.locale_text: {n}詹里斯发出了类似于笑声的咕噜声。{/n}“真是个花里胡哨的名字，您说是吧？老实说，他们是一群海盗，总是在为如何划分领地，如何分赃吵个不停。不过，他们的舰队需要从我们这里购买补给……或者他们也可能不闻不问，直接从我们手里把东西抢走。当然了，和这群恶棍交易总是有风险的。他们可能会突然改变主意，打算抢走我们的船。不过，到目前为止，他们在我们的舰炮面前还是挺老实的。听说虚空协联的代表是莱萨·卡瓦利亚，她最喜欢的去的地方，是落脚港的艾玛赛克烈酒修会。”

languages.text: {n}Janris se ríe, aunque el sonido es más un gorgoteo.{/n} «Menudo nombre más pomposo, ¿verdad? A decir verdad, son una banda de piratas que no paran de discutir por cuestiones de botín y territorio. Sin embargo, algunas de sus flotillas necesitan suministros... y a veces pueden librarnos de carga incómoda sin hacer preguntas. Al ser piratas, siempre existe el riesgo de que decidan intentar abordarnos, pero hasta ahora los macrocañones de la nave han bastado para disuadirles. Dicen que Ryzza Calvaria habla en nombre de la Hermandad. Su antro favorito es el Adeptus Amasecus de Paso».
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris se ríe, aunque el sonido es más un gorgoteo.{/n} «Menudo nombre más pomposo, ¿verdad? A decir verdad, son una banda de piratas que no paran de discutir por cuestiones de botín y territorio. Sin embargo, algunas de sus flotillas necesitan suministros... y a veces pueden librarnos de carga incómoda sin hacer preguntas. Al ser piratas, siempre existe el riesgo de que decidan intentar abordarnos, pero hasta ahora los macrocañones de la nave han bastado para disuadirles. Dicen que Ryzza Calvaria habla en nombre de la Hermandad. Su antro favorito es el Adeptus Amasecus de Paso".

languages.text: {n}ジャンリスは笑うように喉を鳴らした。{/n}「なんとも大仰な名前ではないでしょうか？実体としては、戦利品と領土をめぐって永遠にいがみ合う海賊の一団でしかありません。ですが、彼らの小さな船団の中には、物資を必要とする者や…あるいは、何も言わず厄介な貨物を引き取ってくれる者もあります。もちろん、悪党どもが心変わりして、代わりに我々の船に乗り込もうとするリスクは常にありますが、今のところ我々のマクロキャノンがなんとか彼らを抑えています。ライザ・カルバリアが一団の代表として振る舞っているそうですが、彼女はフットフォールのアデプトゥス・アマセックにしばしば出没すると噂されています」
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジャンリスは笑うように喉を鳴らした。{/n}「なんとも大仰な名前ではないでしょうか？実体としては、戦利品と領土をめぐって永遠にいがみ合う海賊の一団でしかありません。ですが、彼らの小さな船団の中には、物資を必要とするものや…あるいは、何も問うことなく、我らの手から厄介な貨物を引き取ってくれるものもあります。もちろん、悪党どもが心変わりして、代わりに我々の船に乗り込もうとするリスクは常にありますが、今のところ我々のマクロキャノンがなんとか彼らを抑えています。ライザ・カルバリアが一団の代表として振る舞っているそうです。フットフォールのアデプトゥス・アマセカスは彼女のお気に入りの場所だと噂されています」

languages.text: {n}Janris lacht gurgelnd.{/n} "Ein pompöser Name, nicht wahr? In Wahrheit handelt es sich um eine Piratenbande, die ständig über Beute und Territorien streitet. Aber einige ihrer kleinen Flottillen benötigen Vorräte ... oder nehmen uns unangenehme Fracht ab, ohne Fragen zu stellen. Natürlich besteht immer das Risiko, dass diese Schurken ihre Meinung ändern und versuchen, uns zu entern, aber bisher konnten unsere Makrokanonen sie noch unter Kontrolle halten. Es heißt, die Sprecherin der Gefährten sei Ryzza Calvaria. Das Adeptus Amasecus auf Footfall soll ihr Lieblingsplatz sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris lacht gurgelnd.{/n} "Ein pompöser Name, nicht wahr? In Wahrheit handelt es sich um eine Piratenbande, die ständig über Beute und Territorien streitet. Aber einige ihrer kleinen Flottillen benötigen Vorräte ... oder nehmen uns unangenehme Fracht ab, ohne Fragen zu stellen. Natürlich besteht immer das Risiko, dass diese Schurken ihre Meinung ändern und versuchen, uns zu entern, aber bisher konnten unsere Makrokanonen sie noch unter Kontrolle halten. Es heißt, die Sprecherin der Gefährten sei Ryzza Calvaria. Das Adeptus Amasecus auf Footfall soll ihr Lieblingsplatz sein."

languages.text: {n}Janris lâche un gargouillis amusé.{/n} « Un nom pompeux, n'est-ce pas ? À dire vrai, il s'agit avant tout d'un groupe de pirates déchiré par d'incessantes querelles de territoire et de partage de butin. Certaines de leurs flottilles ont cependant besoin d'être ravitaillées... ou peuvent nous débarrasser d'une cargaison gênante sans poser de question. Bien sûr, il n'est jamais exclu que ces crapules changent d'avis et tentent de nous aborder, mais nos macro-canons ont toujours eu un effet dissuasif. Du moins, jusqu'ici. À ce qu'on raconte, Ryzza Calvaria parlerait au nom de la Communauté, et l'Adeptus Amasecus de Castel serait son endroit favori. »
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris lâche un gargouillis amusé.{/n} « Un nom pompeux, n'est-ce pas ? À dire vrai, il s'agit avant tout d'un groupe de pirates déchiré par d'incessantes querelles de territoire et de partage de butin. Certaines de leurs flottilles ont cependant besoin d'être ravitaillées... ou peuvent nous débarrasser d'une cargaison gênante sans poser de question. Bien sûr, il n'est jamais exclu que ces crapules changent d'avis et tentent de nous aborder, mais nos macro-canons ont toujours eu un effet dissuasif. Du moins, jusqu'ici. À ce qu'on raconte, Ryzza Calvaria parlerait au nom de la Communauté, et l'Adeptus Amasecus de Castel serait son endroit favori. »

languages.text: {n}Janris, gırtlağından kahkahaya benzeyen bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Cafcaflı bir isim, değil mi? Aslına bakarsanız sabah akşam ganimet ve bölge için didişen bir korsan çetesi. Bununla birlikte küçük filotillalarından bazılarının malzemeye ihtiyacı oluyor. Elimizdeki sıkıntılı malları sorgusuz sualsiz almaları da cabası. Elbette bu alçakların fikirlerini değiştirme ve bizi bordalama girişiminde bulunma riski her daim mevcut. Ancak makro toplarımız şimdiye dek onları hizada tutmayı başardı. Ryzza Calvaria'nın Kardeşlik'in sözcülüğünü üstlendiği söyleniyor. Dedikodulara göre Binliman'daki Adeptus Amasekus'un gediklisiymiş, sık sık uğrarmış mekâna."
languages.original_text: {n}Janris emits a laugh-like gurgle.{/n} "A pompous name, is it not? In truth, they are a gang of pirates who are forever squabbling over loot and territory. However, some of their little flotillas need supplies... or can take awkward cargo off our hands without asking questions. Of course, there is always a risk that these scoundrels will change their mind and attempt to board us instead, but so far our macro-cannons have managed to keep them in line. They say Ryzza Calvaria speaks on the Fellowship's behalf. The Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt."

Bununla birlikte küçük filotillalarından bazılarının malzemeye ihtiyacı oluyor. Elimizdeki sıkıntılı malları sorgusuz sualsiz almaları da cabası. Elbette bu alçakların fikirlerini değiştirme ve bizi bordalama girişiminde bulunma riski her daim mevcut. Ancak makro toplarımız şimdiye dek onları hizada tutmayı başardı. Ryzza Calvaria'nın Kardeşlik'in sözcülüğünü üstlendiği söyleniyor. Dedikodulara göre Binliman'daki Adeptus Amasekus'un gediklisiymiş, sık sık uğrarmış mekâna."
